CustomField.description: Returns Account Sub-Constituency as text for Compact Layouts.
CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Climate - Global Climate" ), "Climate - Global Climate; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Climate - Legal and Regulatory" ), "Climate - Legal and Regulatory; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Development - Government" ), "Development - Government; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Development - Institutional Giving" ), "Development - Institutional Giving; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Development - Major Gifts" ), "Development - Major Gifts; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Development - Planned Giving Estates" ), "Development - Planned Giving Estates; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Development - Planned Giving Ospreys" ), "Development - Planned Giving Ospreys; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Development - Planned Giving Prospects" ), "Development - Planned Giving Prospects; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "EDFBIZ - Climate Corps" ), "EDFBIZ - Climate Corps; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "EDFBIZ - Corporate Climate Leadership" ), "EDFBIZ - Corporate Climate Leadership; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Global Strategy - China" ), "Global Strategy - China; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Global Strategy - Europe" ), "Global Strategy - Europe; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "MarComm - Ambassador" ), "MarComm - Ambassador; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "MarComm - Performance Marketing" ), "MarComm - Performance Marketing; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Membership - Catalyst Circle" ), "Membership - Catalyst Circle; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Oceans - Fishery Solutions Center" ), "Oceans - Fishery Solutions Center; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Political Affairs - Advocacy Network" ), "Political Affairs - Advocacy Network; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Political Affairs - C4 Defend Our Future" ), "Political Affairs - C4 Defend Our Future; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Political Affairs - C4 Moms Clean Air Force" ), "Political Affairs - C4 Moms Clean Air Force; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Political Affairs - Defend Our Future" ), "Political Affairs - Defend Our Future; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Organization_sub_constituency__c , "Political Affairs - Moms Clean Air Force" ), "Political Affairs - Moms Clean Air Force; ",null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns Account Sub-Constituency as text for Compact Layouts.
CustomField.label: Sub-Constituency Text
